title: 820-2879 charger shorts with battery connected
message:
820-2879 first it was not charge (ppbus 1.5v) i was changed u7000 now its turn on with charger(green light) and with battery but its not turn on automatically with just charger(no auto fan spin) but work just with power button. 
with charger there is green light but when i connect the battery the green light turn off.

title: 820-2879 charger shorts with battery connected
message: now ppbus is 19.4v with just charger and with just battery 10.8v

title: 820-2879 charger shorts with battery connected
message:
Power button must be triggered for Core 2 machines with NVidia MCP to turn on.
Shorted Q7030 or bad soldering of U7000.

title: 820-2879 charger shorts with battery connected
message: q7030 no short u7000 sholdering again, power button work with battery and with charger..
